trans-unit.source: Specifies a standard interface for retrieving feature information from the current system.
When implemented in a class, IFeatureSupport provides methods you can use to determine whether a feature is currently installed on the system and to get the version number of a feature.
Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport.IsPresent%2A> to determine whether a feature, or a specific version of a feature, is currently installed.
Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport.GetVersionPresent%2A> to determine the version number of an installed feature.
See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature> classes for implementations of this interface.
Retrieves the version of the specified feature.
For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.GetVersionPresent%2A>.
The feature whose version is requested.
A <xref:System.Version> representing the version number of the specified feature; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the feature is not installed.
Determines whether any version of the specified feature is currently available on the system.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the feature is present; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is currently available on the system.
A <xref:System.Version> representing the minimum version number of the feature to look for.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the requested version of the feature is present; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
